name: Combat Vehicle AI 0.1
description:
Feedback and Requests for the Combat Vehicle AI is Appreciated!

Currently working on a new project that involves developing AI (Artificial Intelligence) for use on Tanks and other combat vehicles in games.

The AI uses behavior trees to control the tanks.
In this video I showcase a use case of how this AI can be used in games.
This Demo showcases following behaviors of the AI in-game:

  • Advancing towards targets
  • Flanking targets
  • Retreating and hiding.
  • Evading projectiles
  • Seeking out targets.
  • Massive Team based battle

This AI is developed for YOU, so if you got any ideas or feedback, please share it below in the comments, so that I can develop this tank AI in a way that is most useful for you.

Follow the development of this project at the Unity Forum

Controls:

WASD = Moves your tank.

Arrow Keys = Moves the Turret and Cannon.

SPACE = fires projectile.
